criteria: Understanding of the Relationship Between Addition/Subtraction and Length
descriptions: The number line is missing or fundamentally incorrect, showing no understanding of representing whole numbers as lengths.
The number line is present but contains significant errors in spacing or labeling, indicating a limited understanding.
The number line has some inaccuracies in spacing or labeling, but generally represents whole numbers as lengths.
The number line is mostly accurate, with minor errors that do not significantly impact the representation of whole numbers as lengths.
The number line is accurate and clearly represents whole numbers as lengths from 0 with equally spaced points.
The number line is exceptionally clear, accurate, and effectively represents whole numbers as lengths. It is well-labeled and easy to understand.
Sums and differences are not represented on the number line, or the representation is completely incorrect.
Sums and differences are attempted on the number line, but there are major errors in calculations or representation.
Sums and differences are represented with some errors in calculations or in showing the process on the number line.
Sums and differences are mostly accurate, with only minor errors in calculation or representation.
Sums and differences are accurately represented on the number line, clearly showing the process of addition and subtraction.
Sums and differences are expertly represented on the number line, with clear, accurate, and efficient demonstrations of addition and subtraction processes. Shows creative problem solving.
Demonstrates no understanding of how addition and subtraction relate to length on a number line.
Shows a very limited understanding of the relationship, with significant misconceptions.
Shows some understanding of the relationship, but struggles to articulate or apply it correctly.
Demonstrates a general understanding of the relationship, but may have occasional difficulties in application.
Clearly understands and demonstrates the relationship between addition/subtraction and length on the number line.
Exemplifies a deep understanding of the relationship, able to explain and apply it in various contexts. Can connect the visual to the concept
